text: Oh yeah! Let's learn English with Black Widow.

In the first scene we'll see a clip from 
the movie and then an exclusive video where

Scarlett Johansson talks about the movie. And 
in case you're new here, we make lessons just

like this every week to help you learn English 
without getting lost, without missing the jokes

and without subtitles. Just like Sachini who says 
that they're addicted to our channel and it's the

best way to learn English. So if you want to 
have fun learning English with us, make sure

you hit that subscribe button and the bell down 
below so that you don't miss a single new lesson.

If you're a fan of Scarlett Johansson, check out 
this lesson we made with her incredible film Lucy,

which you won't want to miss. You can watch it 
next by clicking up here or the link down below.
